Label.style: text-align: center; color: white; font-size: 24px; text-shadow: 0px 0px 6px 6 #000000; text-overflow: shrink; align: center center; font-family: monospaceNumbersFont; z-index: 2;

Panel.style: transition-property: opacity; transition-delay: 0.0s; transition-duration: 0.6s; background-color:#060b65; opacity: .8; z-index: 0; width: 80%; height: 80%; align: center center;
